docs.overview:
# Progress Bar

Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.
docs.api: # Zard Progress Bar API ## `` Component The `z-progress-bar` component is a flexible and customizable progress bar that allows full styling control using class-variance-authority (CVA). It provides several configuration options for size, shape, type, and more. ### **Usage** ### **Properties** | Property | Description | Type | Default | | ------------------ | ------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- | | `[progress]` | Progress percentage (0-100). | `number` | `0` | | `[zType]` | Defines the color variant. | `'default' \| 'destructive' \| 'accent'` | `'default'` | | `[zSize]` | Sets the height of the bar. | `'default' \| 'sm' \| 'lg'` | `'default'` | | `[zShape]` | Defines the border radius style. | `'default' \| 'square'` | `'default'` | | `[zFull]` | Makes the container take full width. | `boolean` | `false` | | `[class]` | Custom classes for the container. | `string` | `''` | | `[barClass]` | Custom classes for the progress bar. | `string` | `''` | | `[zIndeterminate]` | Define loading infinity state. | `boolean` | `false` |
